name: cantonese
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a Chinese language spoken in the south of China and used as an official language in Hong Kong
[ C ] a person from the Guandong region in the south of China the Cantonese [ plural ]
the people of the Guandong region in the south of China
